title: Dynamic microbial regulation of triiron tetrairon phosphate nanomaterials in the tomato rhizosphere
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1157-1169
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00797A, Paper
Liya Jiao, Le Yue, Xiehui Le, Xuesong Cao, Feiran Chen, Chuanxi Wang, Xiaoli Zhang, Hua Zou, Zhenyu Wang
In this study, microbial dynamics in the tomato rhizosphere was explored at seedling, flowering, and mature stages after soil was amended with 50 mg kgâˆ’1 triiron tetrairon phosphate nanomaterials (Fe7(PO4)6 NMs) and conventional ion fertilizer.
